A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The plot was terrible\, choreography and imagery rubbish. Fails as both a standalone film\, and as path 2 of a 3 part series.

Characters are ruined or wasted\, the original films are ruined and the entire work lacks what makes a star wars film.

This terrible film did the impossible\, and became worse than the phantom menace and the attack of the clones.
